## ReadableBeraBorrow.getLiquidityMiningPOLLENReward() method

Get the amount of POLLEN earned by an address through mining liquidity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose POLLEN reward should be retrieved. |
